title: CaC2 rxn - hybridization change on C in Rxn 3

content.question: When Reaction 3 occurs, does the hybridization of the carbon atoms change?

choices.label: Yes; it changes from sp to sp2.
Yes; it changes from sp to sp3.
Yes; it changes from sp2 to sp3.

content.answer: Yes; it changes from sp to sp2.

skill.text: 1.A: Describe the components of and quantitative information from models and representations that illustrate particulate-level properties only.
